title: Hour 1: Arch Madness
description:
Stephen A. Smith and Kendrick Perkins debate if the Knicks made a mistake by trading away the 11th pick of the 2022 NBA Draft to the Thunder. The guys discuss how Kyrie Irving looks after making a sign-and-trade wish list if no deal with the Nets is made. Rece Davis stops by to talk about Arch Manning committing to Texas.

itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: Arch Manning commits to Texas.
